about_the_game:
Agarest 2 - DLC Bundle #6


1st & 2nd Extra Costumes
Here is something for one of the lovely ladies in your life to bathe in!

1st, 2nd & 4th Extra Characters
Hark! Allies that will share in your joys and sorrows have come in droves! Now, it is time to overcome adversity together!
detailed_description:
Agarest 2 - DLC Bundle #6


1st & 2nd Extra Costumes
Here is something for one of the lovely ladies in your life to bathe in!

1st, 2nd & 4th Extra Characters
Hark! Allies that will share in your joys and sorrows have come in droves! Now, it is time to overcome adversity together!

name: Agarest 2 - Bundle #6

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 64Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 128Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
